4Display #permalink

functions and mixins that affect the displaying of elements -> style them

4.1@mixin dropShadow #permalink

  • $x
    x offset value. defaults to $dropShadow-x
  • $y
    y offset value. defaults to $dropShadow-y
  • $color
    color of the drop shadow. defaults to $dropShadow-color

adds a box-shadow to the element

4.2@mixin opacity #permalink

  • $opacity
    the ratio to change the opacity to (between 0 and 1)

sets the opacity of an element

4.3@mixin rounded-corners #permalink

  • $amount
    length of radius to add to element. defaults to $border-radius

adds a border radius to the element
